message: Dumbassery is strong with him.

Katie, I am on a long car ride and I just read some people's ignorant comments. Try not to take them personally. I have a horrible chronic physical illness and sometimes to help me through it I just read the comments on news feed and laugh. I think to myself how the hell can some people be so ignorant and judgemental? Lol. Sometimes I will comment, just to try to educate
